scripts.clean: rimraf dist && mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p dist/public
scripts.build:js:browser: browserify src/client/index.js -o dist/public/client.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch:browser: watchify src/client/index.js -o dist/public/client.js  -d -v -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.dev: parallelshell "npm run start" "npm run livereload" "npm run watch"
scripts.test:client: mkdir -p testdist/public && babel test/client -d testdist && browserify -t babelify test/client/**/*.js > testdist/public/client.js && node testdist/index.js
scripts.test: npm run test:common && npm run test:client
